detail_desc: Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Fitted top in jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.

Whooli Chen x H&M. Rabbit-shaped shoulder bag in soft faux shearling with a zip at the top and shoulder strap in shimmering imitation leather with a press-stud at one end. Padded head with an embroidered face and appliqués in the shape of long, cuddly ears. Tail in the shape of a contrasting colour faux fur pompom. Patterned lining. The polyester content of the bag is recycled. Height 12 cm. Width 13 cm.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline that has gathers front and back. Opening with ties at the back of the neck and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, low dropped shoulders, cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in soft, washed cotton denim with a small, frilled collar, yoke, press-studs down the front and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs.
Small shopper in soft suede with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, a detachable shoulder strap and twill-lined base. Size 12x20x20 cm.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some wool with wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in a jacquard weave with a sheen. Notch lapels and a fastening with one button at the front. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Wide top in sturdy cotton jersey with a wider neckline, low-dropped shoulders and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Joggers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Seamless sports bra in fast-drying fabric with removable inserts, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, ribbed trim at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Straight-style top in sweatshirt fabric with flounce-trimmed, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a flounced trim at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front, real back pockets and seams at the knees.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a motif, gently dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Cap in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cable-knit jumper in a cotton blend. Wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric. Detachable hood with concealed press-studs, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.

Short dress in cotton poplin with a V-neck, buttons down the front, gathered shoulder seams and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist, a fabric belt with a covered buckle, discreet pockets in the side seams and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a fleece-lined stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and elastication on the inside of the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Thin metal rings in various designs, one decorated with a resin bead.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, gathered shoulder seams for a draped effect and short puff sleeves.
Wide, sleeveless dress in softly draping jersey. Unlined.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
Dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar and buttons at the front. Flap chest pockets, a yoke at the back, drawstring at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Ankle-length kaftan in sturdy satin with a sheen. V-neck, short sleeves, buttons down the front, and a yoke and vertical seam at the back.
Trousers in soft, stretch twill with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs. Ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with 3/4-length, flounced sleeves. Elastication and a frill trim at the top and hem.

Jeggings in superstretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets. Some of the cotton content of the jeggings is recycled. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Bootees in a soft cotton knit with embroidery and appliqués at the top and a high foldover shaft in jersey. Jersey lining. Soft soles.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, textured knit with a ribbed collar, long sleeves and ribbing in a contrasting colour at the cuffs and hem.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers in fast-drying fabric with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams, tapered legs and reflective details.
Shorts in a patterned crêpe weave with a high waist, pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in light sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs and raw-edge hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length, asymmetric skirt in an airy, patterned, pleated weave. High waist with a reinforced waistband, and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Metal snake chain necklace decorated with large metal discs. Adjustable length 50-59 cm.
Short, fitted dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with lacing at the front and worn details. Zip fly and button and a raw-edge hem.
Treggings in stretch, patterned twill made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a detachable belt with metal rings.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and concealed zip at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves and buttoned cuffs with broderie anglaise. Unlined.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small embroidered detail on the chest and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a double layer of frills and narrow adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small metal detail.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Coat in jacquard-patterned jersey with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch denim. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets with a print motif and appliqués. Unlined.
Wide tunic in an airy weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves, narrow, frill-trimmed buttoned cuffs, and tiers to the hem. Partly lined.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Reversible imitation leather belt with a different colour on each side and a reversible metal buckle. Width approx. 2 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with pin-tucks that create a striped pattern.
Scarf in soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size 65x180 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print and terry motif, a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif, opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trim at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Hoodie in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and double-layered hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and ties at the hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and legs with side stripes and elasticated, ribbed hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Short, round-necked dress in an airy weave with beaded embroidery at the top and down the sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs, and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Calf-length slip dress in satin with a draped neckline, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a slit in one side. Unlined.
Wide shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton. Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and print stripes down the sides of the legs.
